traits.name: Amorphous
entries: The plasmoid can squeeze through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide, provided it is wearing and carrying nothing. It has advantage on ability checks it makes to initiate or escape a grapple.

traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The plasmoid can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The plasmoid makes three Pseudopod attacks. It can replace one of those attacks with a Spear or Pistol attack.

actions.name: Pseudopod
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Spear
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 ({@dice 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Pistol
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
